DtnSim: A Python-based simulator for DTN¶

Author

Marc Sanchez Net

Address

4800 Oak Grove Dr. Pasadena, CA 91109

Contact

marc.sanchez.net@jpl.nasa.gov

Organization

Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL)

Release

R2019b

Repository

https://github.com/msancheznet/dtnsim

Abstract

Welcome to DtnSim, Python-based simulator for Delay Tolerant Networking.

Copyright and Licensing¶

Copyright (c) 2019, California Institute of Technology (“Caltech”). U.S. Government sponsorship acknowledged.

pyion is currently an open-source package distributed under the Apache 2.0 license.
